info.label: Web & blockchain developer
info.brief: After 17 years as a web developer, I recently acquired an extensive experience into blockchain development, as Talao's lead developer. I'm now looking for new challenges either in startups in a major role, or in well-established compagnies as a technical partner. I only work in remote from Toulouse (but can travel from time to time), and at max 4 days a week (I dedicate 1 day/week to personal projects). Thanks for your interest!

history.summary: With the [National Physical Laboratory](http://www.npl.co.uk/) (NPL), we developed a Quality assurance editing and review system for the [Climate data store](https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/) (CDS) of the [European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts](https://www.ecmwf.int/) (ECMWF).

My work at Talao involved technical architecture conception, technical lead of small teams (up to 3 developers), and dApps development with: Ethereum blockchain smartcontracts in Solidity, Truffle tests, connectivity with Web3 version 1 with Metamask, interfaces with React and Material UI. I also integrated other techs like Node, MySQL, and standards like like MIT's Blockcerts.org.
highlights: Architecture conception, technical lead and developer of the upcoming Talao Certified Experience. It's a hybrid decentralized & centralized platform based on the interconnection of: Ethereum smart contracts, a Node.js/MySQL backend, 2 React interfaces, and a Python Blockcerts.org issuer.
Took part of the Initial coin offering (ICO) and the Know your customer (KYC)
First Ethereum technologies tests at Talao and development of an early DAO prototype

Drupal: Direct clients = [CNRS](https://www.cnrs.fr), [SQLi](http://www.sqli.com/), [Brocelia](https://www.brocelia.fr/), [Couleur-citron.com](https://www.couleur-citron.com/), [eMindHub](https://www.emindhub.com) / Final clients: [Pierre Fabre group](https://www.pierre-fabre.com) ([Klorane](https://www.klorane.com/), [Ducray](https://www.ducray.com)), various confidential major french compagnies. See also Telespazio experience.

history.summary: From 2004 to 2016, I was web developer at the french national institute for Earth sciences and Astronomy (CNRS-INSU).
highlights: Drupal expert for CNRS on other projects like CNRSnews.fr
Web expert in numerous CNRS professional committees for recruitment and internal careers
